slider_items.label: Slider Items
slider_items.comment: This variable allows you to set the maximum amount of items displayed at a time with the widest browser width

slider_items_desktop.label: Slider Items Desktop
slider_items_desktop.comment:
This allows you to preset the number of slides visible at between 1200px and 993px browser width.
For example 4 means that if(window<=1200 and window>992){ show 4 slides per page}

slider_items_desktop_small.label: Slider Items Desktop Small
slider_items_desktop_small.comment:
This allows you to preset the number of slides visible at between 992px and 769px browser width.
For example 4 means that if(window<=992 and window>767){ show 4 slides per page}

slider_items_tablet.label: Slider Items Tablet
slider_items_tablet.comment:
This allows you to preset the number of slides visible at between 768px and 321px browser width.
For example 4 means that if(window<=767 and window>321){ show 4 slides per page}

slider_items_mobile.label: Slider Items Mobile
slider_items_mobile.comment:
This allows you to preset the number of slides visible at between 320px and 0px browser width.
For example 4 means that if(window<=320){ show 4 slides per page}
